title: Gut Reactions
description:
Angela Sawyer, John Rohr and Paul Triggiani share stories about faking it in college, defending oneself in court, and false accusations.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Colman Brothers, Angela Sawyer, Jeff Barr, John Rohr, AC/DC, Lokua, Paul Triggiani, Emmerson Lake and Palmer)
